column4: hey I ran into something on the internet and it's kind of funny to me because I did not get it what it has to do with Linux.. it's a router : http://linksysbycisco.com/US/en/products/WRT54GL have anyone seen this?
i think they're just being stupid
never herad of an operating system specific router (i.e. piece of network hardware)
yeah I didn't expect that from cisco lol.. plus they don't even describe why its called a linux router
